OBJECTIVE
Since I was a student and studied Software Engineer in my university, I had a chance to join mobile
development industry in the rising period of two famous platform Android & iOS. Since then I have driven
and followed my dream to become a mobile developer.With many years of exeperience in terms of
developing mobile app in both platform Android & iOS, I have had a chance to research and write mutiple
cross-platform apps. At the moment, I want to become a Mobile leader with amazing mobile team or at
least to become a good colleague to show my dedication in the company.I hope I can get a "lovely price"
to fit with anything I do for your company.

Description
This is the app that helps Parent to take care their childer. This app provides
some features that allow Kids to interact within the app and allow additional
devices to connect with it via Bluetooth or WIFI. In Parent dashboard, Mom
can collect and view data from Smart Ball or Band devices and they can also
add creat a meal planner for their each kid.
